sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO NBOARD (UNQ, TITLE, PASS, NAME, CONTENT, HITS, RDATE) VALUES (NBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #title#, #pass#, #name#, #content#, 0, SYSDATE)
sqlMap.select: SELECT RN, UNQ, TITLE, NAME, HITS, RDATE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, UNQ, TITLE, NAME, HITS, RDATE FROM ( SELECT UNQ, TITLE, NAME, HITS, TO_CHAR(RDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') RDATE FROM NBOARD ORDER BY UNQ DESC )) WHERE RN BETWEEN 1 AND 5
SELECT CODE, GID, NAME FROM CODES WHERE CODE=#code#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE CODES SET GID=#gid#, NAME=#name# WHERE CODE=#code#
